When one indulges in selfishness or sharp dealing, he shows that he does not fear the Lord or reverence His name. Those 
                                                                           1159
who are connected with God will not only shun all injustice, but will manifest His mercy and goodness toward all with whom they have to do. The Lord will sanction no respect of person; but He will not approve the course of those who make no difference in favor of the poor, the widow, and the orphan (Letter 20a, 1893).
